topic_name: Green iron exports (DRI, HBI, hot metal, ESF pathways)
operator_archetype: Integrated iron ore producers and green iron joint ventures
epc_archetype: DRI-EAF plant integrators and heavy industrial EPC firms
offtaker_archetype: Asian steel mills and global automotive steel buyers
technology_licensor_archetype: Direct reduction technology licensors and digital plant OEMs
financier_archetype: Export credit agencies, infrastructure funds, and superannuation-backed project finance
key_dependencies: Firmed power, low-cost hydrogen, rail and port capacity, long-term offtake
why_here: Existing iron ore scale and export logistics create the strongest launch platform

topic_name: Green aluminium (low-carbon alumina plus renewable-powered smelting, alloys)
likely_hub_region: Gladstone QLD, Kwinana WA, Bell Bay TAS
operator_archetype: Alumina refiners, smelter operators, and alloy producers
offtaker_archetype: Global packaging, transport, and clean-energy manufacturers
technology_licensor_archetype: Smelter technology licensors and process optimisation providers
financier_archetype: Corporate balance sheets, green bonds, and policy-linked concessional finance
key_dependencies: Competitive renewable power, transmission upgrades, and certified low-carbon credentials
why_here: Large existing alumina base and industrial ecosystems reduce execution risk

topic_name: Copper upgrading (refining plus semi-fab: rod, wire, foil)
likely_hub_region: Mount Isa-Townsville QLD corridor and SA copper belt
epc_archetype: Smelter-refinery modernisation EPC and downstream fabrication EPC
offtaker_archetype: Cable manufacturers, renewable equipment OEMs, and electronics buyers
technology_licensor_archetype: Refining process licensors and rolling-drawing technology vendors
financier_archetype: Project finance banks, strategic offtake-backed lenders, and industry co-investors
key_dependencies: Concentrate and scrap feed security, energy reliability, and logistics integration
why_here: Strong resource base and existing metallurgical capability support near-term expansion

topic_name: Rare earth separation to oxides (NdPr, Dy, Tb)
operator_archetype: Rare earth concentrate producers and separation operators
epc_archetype: Hydromet processing EPC with specialty chemicals capability
offtaker_archetype: Magnet alloy producers and clean-tech OEM supply chains
technology_licensor_archetype: Separation chemistry and solvent extraction technology providers
financier_archetype: Strategic government facilities, export finance, and private equity partners
key_dependencies: Reagent supply, waste handling, and qualification with downstream customers
why_here: Australia already hosts strategic projects and can scale trusted separated oxide supply

topic_name: Permanent magnets (NdFeB): metals, alloys, magnet manufacturing
operator_archetype: Magnet manufacturers and advanced materials industrial partners
epc_archetype: Precision manufacturing EPC and plant automation integrators
offtaker_archetype: EV motor manufacturers, wind turbine OEMs, and defence primes
technology_licensor_archetype: Powder metallurgy process licensors and magnet line equipment suppliers
financier_archetype: Strategic industry funds, defence procurement pathways, and anchor offtake financing
key_dependencies: Qualified feedstock, OEM co-development, and standards compliance
why_here: Captures the highest leverage step beyond separated rare earth oxides

topic_name: Battery-grade lithium chemicals (hydroxide, carbonate where viable)
operator_archetype: Lithium converters and integrated spodumene-to-chemical operators
epc_archetype: Chemical processing EPC and modular plant providers
offtaker_archetype: Battery cathode producers and global cell manufacturers
technology_licensor_archetype: Conversion process licensors and quality-control software providers
financier_archetype: Corporate project finance, long-term offtake-linked debt, and strategic equity
key_dependencies: Spodumene feed certainty, reagent chain security, and quality consistency
why_here: Strong upstream position and existing processing footprint support scaling

likely_hub_region: Gladstone QLD and Bell Bay TAS
operator_archetype: Silicon smelter operators and integrated industrial producers
epc_archetype: Furnace EPC, power systems EPC, and emissions-control integrators
offtaker_archetype: Solar, alloy, and chemical intermediate buyers in Asia-Pacific
technology_licensor_archetype: Furnace design licensors and process-control technology firms
financier_archetype: Industrial infrastructure funds, strategic debt, and corporate co-investment
key_dependencies: Low-cost reliable power, reductant supply, and export terminal access
why_here: High-value intermediate with multi-chain demand and strong industrial adjacency

topic_name: Graphite anode materials (purified spherical graphite, coated anode)
operator_archetype: Graphite processors and anode active material producers
epc_archetype: Chemical purification EPC and coated-material line integrators
technology_licensor_archetype: Purification, coating, and particle-engineering technology providers
financier_archetype: Strategic offtake-backed debt and development finance participation
key_dependencies: Feedstock contracts, purification chemistry, and customer qualification
why_here: Positioned at a battery bottleneck with growing regional demand

topic_name: Fertilisers and ag-inputs (potash, phosphate, finished fertilisers; low-carbon ammonia integration)
operator_archetype: Fertiliser producers and integrated chemical platform operators
epc_archetype: Ammonia-fertiliser complex EPC and terminal EPC
offtaker_archetype: Agribusiness distributors and regional food-chain buyers
financier_archetype: Trade finance, project debt, and strategic agribusiness partnerships
key_dependencies: Ammonia integration, reagent platform, and export shipping access
why_here: Large regional demand and exportable chemistry platform potential

topic_name: Green chemical feedstocks at scale (ammonia, methanol)
likely_hub_region: Pilbara WA, Gladstone QLD, and Darwin NT
operator_archetype: Chemical producers and energy-transition project developers
offtaker_archetype: Shipping fuel buyers, power utilities, and industrial chemical offtakers
technology_licensor_archetype: Synthesis loop licensors and terminal handling technology suppliers
financier_archetype: Infrastructure debt, sovereign-linked funds, and long-term offtake finance
key_dependencies: Renewable power, hydrogen economics, and export logistics
why_here: Anchor platform that supports both direct exports and domestic processing chains

topic_name: Manganese upgrading (battery and alloying chemicals, EMM and HPMSM pathways)
offtaker_archetype: Battery precursor buyers and steel alloy consumers
technology_licensor_archetype: Chemical route licensors and quality analytics software providers
financier_archetype: Strategic debt, equity partners, and policy-supported project finance
key_dependencies: Feedstock quality, reagent supply, and stable power
why_here: Clear pathway from ore exports to higher-value chemical exports

likely_hub_region: North Queensland and Cobar NSW corridor
operator_archetype: Minor-metals refiners and specialty smelter operators
epc_archetype: Specialty refining EPC and environmental control integrators
offtaker_archetype: Defence supply integrators and industrial chemical buyers
technology_licensor_archetype: Refining flowsheet licensors and analytical QA providers
financier_archetype: Strategic stockpile-linked finance and targeted co-investment
key_dependencies: Secure feedstocks, permitting, and strict environmental compliance
why_here: Concentrated global supply creates disproportionate strategic leverage
